attributes.action: Prosecute Mel Greig and Michael Christian for the death Nurse Jacintha Saldanha
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned demand that Her Majesty's Government seek to have Australian radio presenters Mel Greig and Michael Christian, of 2DayFM Sydney, prosecuted for the death of Nurse Jacintha Saldanha of King Edward VII's Hospital, London. Their actions ultimately caused her death.
